subject: NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Mississippi’s outspoken shooting guard Marshall Henderson has gotten plenty of attention ahead of Friday’s game against Wisconsin, but the Badgers have their own charismatic star: Mike Bruesewitz.
snippet: Mississippi’s outspoken shooting guard Marshall Henderson has gotten plenty of attention ahead of Friday’s game against Wisconsin, but the Badgers have their own charismatic star: Mike Bruesewitz.
